Name: Mahjong Solitaire Refresh
About the game: 'Mahjong Solitaire' is a classic puzzle game of Mahjong tiles. No need to learn the rules of Mahjong; you just match tile designs! Packed to the brim with 256 stages to satisfy all puzzle lovers! Enjoy the rhythm of removing tiles with the series first controls! (Of course, the conventional Click controls are available as well!) Also contains tile arrangements from the arcade versions of 'Shanghai I', 'Shanghai II', and 'Shanghai III'! Play through the game as you like, in the difficulty you prefer! The series first to be themed on water, come have your soul soothed and your mind tickled in 'Mahjong Solitaire Refresh'.
